    • Method Detail

      • setEncryptDataKey

        public boolean setEncryptDataKey(android.os.Bundle dataKey,
                                 android.os.Bundle mode)
                          throws android.os.RemoteException
        key must exist, otherwise return false;
        Specified by:
        setEncryptDataKey in interface ISde
        Parameters:
        dataKey -
        • keyMngType(int) 0-dukpt_TDES(default); 1-dukpt_AES
        • index(int) key index, 0~254, 0 is default value
        mode -
        • encModel(int) set cbc or ecb
          |--0x01 ECB encrypt (default)
          |--0x02 CBC encrypt
        • IVType(int) initialisation vector vector
          |--0x01 Zero (default)
          |--0x02 Randoom
          |--0x03 User defined
        • IV(byte[]) user defined data
        • paddingType(int) padding type, TDES padding based on 8bytes, AES padding base on 16bytes, use setPaddingAlignType() to change it
          |--0x01 zero left padding, data padding with 0x00: 00 00 00 00 XX XX XX XX
          |--0x02 F right padding, data padding with 0xff: XX XX XX XX ff ff ff ff
          |--0x03 PKCS7 Each padding byte equals the padding length. Example: XX XX XX XX 04 04 04 04
          |--0x04 X923 Final padding byte equals the padding length and all other padding bytes equal 0x00. Example: XX XX XX XX 00 00 00 04
          |--0x05 ISO7816 First padding byte equals 0x80 and all other padding bytes equal 0x00. Example: XX XX XX XX 80 00 00 00
          |--0x06 ISO9797_1 Padding bytes are 0x00 if needed to fill block. Example: XX XX XX XX 00 00 00 00 (default)
          |--0x07 space right padding, data padding with 0xff: XX XX XX XX 20 20 20 20
        • TDESKeyUsageIndicator(byte) for 3DES encryptType
          |---0x00 Data Encryption request or both ways
          |---0x01 Data Encryption response (default)
        • AESKeyUsageIndicator(byte), just for AES calculate
          |---0x00 AES Data Encryption, encryption(default)
        • AESDispersionType(byte), just for AES calculate
          |---0-TDES112
          |---1-TDES168
          |---2-AES128(default)
          |---3-AES192
          |---4-AES256
        Throws:
        android.os.RemoteException

      • getEncryptedMsgData

        public android.os.Bundle getEncryptedMsgData(byte[] data,
                                             android.os.Bundle extend)
                                      throws android.os.RemoteException
        Get encrypted input message data
        Specified by:
        getEncryptedMsgData in interface ISde
        Parameters:
        data - data needs to be encrypted
        extend - extend settings
        • paddingAlignType(byte), optional,
          for 3DES, 0 - 8 bytes alignment; 1 - 16 bytes; 2 - 24 bytes;
          for AES, 0 - 16 bytes alignment; 1 - 32 bytes; 2 - 48 bytes;
        Returns:
        result
        • encryptedData(byte[]) encrypted data
        • ksn(byte[]) current ksn
        • initVec(byte[]) - Initial Vector (optional)
        Throws:
        RemoteException

        • supportCTLSCard(boolean) support CTLS card

      • getEncryptedData

        public android.os.Bundle getEncryptedData(int cardType,
                                          java.lang.String tag,
                                          android.os.Bundle extend)
                                   throws android.os.RemoteException
        get sensitive EMV card data
        Specified by:
        getEncryptedData in interface ISde
        Parameters:
        cardType - CARD_INSERT(0)-contact IC card,CARD_RF(1)-contactless card
        tag - Tag name
        extend - optional settings, set null then parameters paddingType & paddingAlignType in setEncryptDataKey will be used.
        • paddingType(int) padding type, TDES padding based on 8bytes, AES padding base on 16bytes
          |--0x01 zero left padding, data padding with 0x00: 00 00 00 00 XX XX XX XX
          |--0x02 F right padding, data padding with 0xff: XX XX XX XX ff ff ff ff
          |--0x03 PKCS7 Each padding byte equals the padding length. Example: XX XX XX XX 04 04 04 04
          |--0x04 X923 Final padding byte equals the padding length and all other padding bytes equal 0x00. Example: XX XX XX XX 00 00 00 04
          |--0x05 ISO7816 First padding byte equals 0x80 and all other padding bytes equal 0x00. Example: XX XX XX XX 80 00 00 00
          |--0x06 ISO9797_1 Padding bytes are 0x00 if needed to fill block. Example: XX XX XX XX 00 00 00 00 (default)
          |--0x07 space right padding, data padding with 0xff: XX XX XX XX 20 20 20 20
          Returns:
          bundle
          • encryptedData(byte[]): encrypted tag value
          • ksn(byte[]): ksn
          • initVec(byte[]) - optional parameter
          • result(int) - result message
            |--- 0-success
            |--- -1-the tag isn't sensitive tag
            |--- -2-invalid params
          • |--- -3-encryption error
          Throws:
          android.os.RemoteException

        • initPinInputView

          public java.util.Map initPinInputView(int keyId,
                                      android.os.Bundle param,
                                      java.util.List<PinKeyCoorInfo> pinKeyInfos)
                               throws android.os.RemoteException
          custom pinpad ui interface
          Specified by:
          initPinInputView in interface ISde
          Parameters:
          keyId - pin key id(0~254)
          param -
          • isOnline(boolean) return pin block(default true)
          • displayKeyValue(byte[]) custom the sequence key number of pinpad
          • pinLimit(byte[]) the valid length(s) array of the PIN (such as {0,4,5,6} means the valid length is 0, 4 ~ 6, maximum value is 12
          • timeout(int) the timeout, unit is second, default 60s
          pinKeyInfos -
          Returns:
          map - the value of 0~9 key to display
          Throws:
          android.os.RemoteException
          Since:
          4.0.0

        • startPinpad

          public void startPinpad(int keyId,
                        int pinBlockType,
                        int keySystem,
                        int mode,
                        android.os.Bundle extraParams,
                        SecurityPinInputListener listener)
                 throws android.os.RemoteException
          Specified by:
          startPinpad in interface ISde
          Parameters:
          keyId - pin key id(0~254)
          pinBlockType -
          |---0x00 3DES format0
          |---0x01 3DES format1
          |---0x02 3DES format2
          |---0x03 3DES format3
          |---0x04 AES format4
          keySystem -
          |---0x01 MK_SK
          |---0x02 DUKPT
          mode -
          |---0x01 ECB
          extraParams -
          • dispersionType(byte) just for AES calculate
            |---0-DES112
            |---1-DES168
            |---2-AES128(default)
            |---3-AES192
            |---4-AES256
          • notifyPinLenError(boolean) - Notification password is not long enough(default false)
          • random(byte[]) - random number participation in pinblock calculation(default not set)
          listener - callback
          Throws:
          android.os.RemoteException

        • setPaddingAlignType

          public boolean setPaddingAlignType(java.util.Map alignType)
                            throws android.os.RemoteException
          default setting: 8 bytes align for 3DES, 16 bytes align for AES
          Specified by:
          setPaddingAlignType in interface ISde
          Parameters:
          alignTypeMap - Map , Key - set alignment type for EMV tags, you can set for PAN(5A), expired of PAN(5F24), track2(57, 9F20-track2 DD, 9F6B-MSD track2, FF9006-MSD Pseudo track2), or default and other spcial EMV tags, pls refer to "con.dreamtek.smartpos.constdefine.ConstISde" Value: - for 3DES, 0 - 8 bytes alignment; 1 - 16 bytes; 2 - 24 bytes; - for AES, 0 - 16 bytes alignment; 1 - 32 bytes; 2 - 48 bytes; 
           {
      Map map = new HashMap<>();
      map.put("pan", 1); // 5A
      map.put("pan_expired", 1); //5F24
      map.put("track2", 1); //57, 9F20, 9F6B, FF9006
      map.put("default", 1);
      map.put("other tags", 1);
      setPaddingAlignType(map);
 }
          Returns:
          result: true or false
          Throws:
          android.os.RemoteException

          Throws:

        • configDataFormat

          public boolean configDataFormat(java.lang.String data,
                                byte format)
                         throws android.os.RemoteException
          Configure the format of the returned data, currently supporting two formats: bcd (compressed) and ascii (uncompressed), corresponding to com.dreamtek.smartposdeviceservice.aidl.sde.DataFormat.FormatType.FORMAT_TYPE_BCD and com.dreamtek.smartposdeviceservice.aidl.sde.DataFormat.FormatType.FORMAT_TYPE_ASCII. For example, if I make the following configuration: configDataFormat(DataFormat. DataType.DATA_TYPE_TRACK2, DataFormat.FORMAT_TYPE_BCD),the track2 information will be encrypted in BCD format and returned. And also please note that if the data is set to com.dreamtek.smartbos.service.aidl.sde.DataFormat.DataType.DATA_TYPE_DEFAULT, the default settings will be used and all previous settings will be reset.
          Specified by:
          configDataFormat in interface ISde
          Parameters:
          data - The data that needs to be configured, please refer to com.dreamtek.smartposdeviceservice.aidl.sde.DataFormat.DataType for the currently supported types.
          format - refer to com.dreamtek.smartposdeviceservice.aidl.sde.DataFormat.FormatType
          Returns:
          success or not
          Throws:
          RemoteException

        • getDataFormat

          public byte getDataFormat(java.lang.String dataType)
                   throws android.os.RemoteException
          get data format before encryption
          Specified by:
          getDataFormat in interface ISde
          Parameters:
          dataType - - pls refer to DataFormat.DataType which in com.dreamtek.smartposconstdefine.ConstISde
          Returns:
          0 - ASCII, 1 - BCD, other value means error.
          Throws:
          RemoteException
